message:
Double click anywhere on the canvas to 
- Open a new window
- ⁠Write a note
- ⁠Paste from clipboard

— To switch spaces —
Open the palette:					⌘ / 

— Windows —
Create a new window:				⌘ N
Minimize window:					⌘ M
Switch to previous / next window:	⌘ ← / ⌘ →

— Tabs —
Reload current Website:			⌘ R
Close a Tab:						⌘ W
Create a Tab:						⌘ T
Switch to previous / next Tab:		⌃ ⇧ ⇥ / ⌃ ⇥       
									(control, shift, tab) / (control, tab)
